author: la savante.
text:
The next man that uses a car analogy to describe women & sex will be met with some very unkind words. 

Women do ❌ loose value the moment they get driven off the lot. 
Women are ❌ depreciating assets.
Women are ❌ property.

Halfway thru 2022 & still chatting shit about this!

author: la savante.
text: All in all, avoid trying to teach yourself everything on your own. Seek guidance, seek learning from others. Don’t watch from a distance, ask to be there with them. When they say enjoy the process, a big chunk of it is during these moments 🤞🏾

author: la savante.
text: I was met with a little regret thinking why did I wait this long to reach out for help? Like, I could be so much farther now in life had I developed an interest sooner. But he reminded me that didn’t matter… now holds more opportunities than ever 🙏🏾

author: la savante.
text: I started sharing my demos and he’s been nothing but enthusiastic about the overall sound I’ve been able to make out of my sessions from home. Now he’s coming over weekly so we can go over the engineering side of the software and get some kick ass professional takes!

author: la savante.
text: I recently expressed my desire in production and mixing. I spent years watching my father from afar doing all this and more for other artist but never having the courage to ask him to teach me out of fear of not living up to his standards or expectations.

author: la savante.
text: My father’s support in music is all I could ever ask for. Everything and anything, he’ll get, he’ll teach, he’ll show up, he’ll support, he’ll listen, he’ll encourage and speak life into this gift I constantly feel should be manifested in another lifetime of mine.

text:

Oh well, back at it again 😁

author: la savante.
text:
That’s it, I’m going to see him live! I was obsessed when he would sing back up for Erykah Badu, but now he deserves all the attention 😍

It’s more than the voice, it’s the character, the tone, his flamboyant nature as a performer! Durand has my heart 🤍 https://t.co/wuQHSqRtHP
